name: Nauticalith (Game Jam)
description:
THIS IS THE ORIGINAL GAME JAM VERSION. IT IS NOT A FULL TITLE.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:
WASD: Move
Space: Jump
Shift: Sprint
Ctrl: Crouch
E: Use
Q: Consume/Sleep

F: Show UI


A game developed for the 2014 #procjam (http://itch.io/jam/procjam) and #7dfps (http://itch.io/jam/7dfps).
For more of our work, check out: http://glassknuckle.com

Art, AI, and Design:
Dave Gedarovich - @entropy_phi

Code and QA:
Logan Thomas - @zStinkLoser
Collin Hern

Music and SFX:
Ben Allen
